div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: EASTON VALLEY COMMUNITY SCHOOL BOARD SPECIAL BOARD MEETING HOSTED ONLINE VIA ZOOM ACCESSED VIA LINK ON WEBPAGE FRIDAY, APRIL 17, 2020 @ 4:00 PM EASTON VALLEY CSD Call to OrderRoll...

h3.a: What is the Plan for Distance Learning?

div.p: Hello Easton Valley Families,I hope you all had a great Easter weekend! As the holiday began winding down I know many of you saw information being released that may have raised many questions...
School is Closed Until Further Notice. Click here for COVID-19 resources: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html See Post

Please use the link to request meals for the next three weeks.
https://forms.gle/iTDFQTkweeeYCHgx8 See Post

Dear EV Community, We wanted to confirm that our scheduled high school graduation services are postponed until further notice. We are continuing to gather information and seek input from seniors to determine the best plan to honor and celebrate their achievements in Easton Valley. Look for details to be communicated in the coming weeks. Thanks! See Post

Yearbooks are still available to purchase online for the 2019-2020 school year until the end of May! https://www.jostens.com/apps/store/productBrowse/1071424/Easton-Valley-High-School/2020-Yearbook/20190629053746520160/CATALOG_SHOP/ See Post
